meanings.definition: A publication issued at regular intervals, such as a magazine or journal.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy reading the periodical my grandma sends me every month.
meanings.sent2: The library has a wide selection of periodicals for visitors to read.
meanings.sent3: The periodical I read yesterday had an article about funny cat videos.
meanings.sent4: Her life felt like a periodical, with each day bringing a new chapter.
meanings.sent5: The colorful covers of the periodicals on the shelf caught my eye.

meanings.definition: Happening or recurring at regular intervals.
meanings.sent1: The periodical rainfall in the region ensures lush green landscapes.
meanings.sent2: His periodical visits to the park always brought a smile to his face.
meanings.sent3: The periodical chirping of the birds outside my window woke me up.
meanings.sent4: The periodical rise and fall of the waves was mesmerizing to watch.
meanings.sent5: The periodical meetings with his friends kept him connected and happy.
